{
  \begin{frame}<beamer>{Contents}

    %\zihao{-6}
    %\tableofcontents[currentsection]
    %\small
    %\footnotesize
  \end{frame}
}
\fi

{
  \begin{frame}<beamer>{Contents}
    %\tableofcontents[currentsection,currentsubsection]

    \tableofcontents[currentsection]
  \end{frame}
}

\iffalse
\begin{frame}[
 plain, % no headlines and footlines
  squeeze, % squeeze all vertical spaces
  shrink=0...10, % shrink everything by n percent
  b, c, or t,
  fragile, % when verbatim is used
]{title}{subtitle}
\end{frame}
\fi



% \lstinputlisting{/path_to_mfile/my_mfile.m}
\usepackage{listings}
%\usepackage{frame} %  to add frame around the code
\lstset{%
%texcl=true,
%language=bash,
%language={[x86masm]Assembler},
%language=sh
%language=Java,
language={[ISO]C++},       % {[Visual]C++}
%language=Python,
%alsolanguage=[ANSI]C,      %can exits multiple alsolanguage, alsolanguage=matlab,alsolanguage=VHDL
%alsolanguage= tcl,
%alsolanguage= XML,
tabsize=4, %
%frame=leftline, % add frames, need package \usepackage{frame},  none|leftline|topline|bottomline|lines|single|shadowbox
%frame=none,
commentstyle=\color{red!50!green!50!blue!50},% light gray
rulesepcolor=\color{red!20!green!20!blue!20},%frame color
  keywordstyle=\color{blue!90}\bfseries, %keyword color
  %keywordstyle=\bf\color{blue},
  showstringspaces=false,%show spaces in the string ?
  stringstyle=\ttfamily, %
  keepspaces=true, %
  breakindent=22pt, %
  %numbers=left,%right, none.
  %firstnumber=100, % counts from 100
  numbers=none,
  stepnumber=1,%if it is set to 2, then only lines 1,3,5... are numbered. default value: stepnumber=1
  %numberstyle=\tiny, %行号字体用小号
  numberstyle={\color[RGB]{0,192,192}\footnotesize} ,% tiny,scriptsize,footnotesize,small,normalsize,large等
  numbersep=5pt,  % 5pt
  basicstyle=\ttfamily\footnotesize, % code style
  showspaces=false, %
  flexiblecolumns=true, %
  breaklines=true, % auto line break for long lines
  breakautoindent=true,%
  breakindent=4em, %
  %escapebegin=\begin{CJK*}{GBK}{hei},escapeend=\end{CJK*},
  aboveskip=1em, %code frame
  %backgroundcolor=\color[RGB]{245,245,244},   %
  backgroundcolor=\color[rgb]{0.91,0.91,0.91},    %
  escapeinside=``,  % enter chinese characters in side ``
  % escapeinside={<@}{@>},
  %% added by http://bbs.ctex.org/viewthread.php?tid=53451
  fontadjust,%
  captionpos=t,%
  framextopmargin=2pt,framexbottommargin=2pt,abovecaptionskip=-3pt,belowcaptionskip=3pt,%
  %xleftmargin=1em,xrightmargin=1em, % left and right spaces of listing
  %
  extendedchars=true,
  columns=flexible,%
  % numbersep=-1em
  morekeywords={int16_t, int32_t},
}
